title: LRS Announces Grand Opening of The Exchange, a Revolutionary Material Recovery Facility Pioneering a New Era of ... - PR Newswire
summary: LRS, a leading waste diversion and recycling company, has opened The Exchange, a state-of-the-art material recovery facility in Chicago. The facility is expected to divert 224 million pounds of recyclables annually, reducing the overall carbon footprint of the waste and recycling process in the Midwest. The Exchange is part of LRS' mission to foster positive change through responsible waste practices.

title: Three-week black bag collections but where do your recycled material end up? - AberdareOnline
summary: Rhondda Cynon Taf Council has been criticized for exporting waste to Malaysia. The council now says that less than 3% of its waste is exported and that the majority of recycling is processed domestically. However, some residents are skeptical, and there is evidence that some of the council's recycling is still being sent to Malaysia.
official_company_name: Rhondda Cynon Taf County Borough Council
